en.title: FE's Event Jakarta, 21st March 2009.
en.content:
FE recently held it's Indonesia Achievers Recognition Dinner at the Millennium Hotel, Jakarta on 21st March 2009. The event was attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee attended the event, together with Thailand's Country Licensee Don Chan and Malaysian Presidential Directors KC Phoon, Willy Toh and Stanley Liew.

At the event, FE announced the appointment of boxer Chris "The Dragon" John as FE's latest spokesman in Indonesia. Chris John, the Manny Pacquai of Indonesia, is the current World Boxing Association Super Champion, having won the world title 10 times, an incredible feat! FE is very proud to have a world class athlete of Chris's caliber as FE's spokesman who shared his testimonial on the stage! Also attending the event and sharing their testimonials were FE's Indonesian spokesmen Ade Rai (Champion Bodybuilder), Candra Wijaya (Olympic Badminton Gold Medalist) and spokeswoman Suzy Susanti (Olympic Badminton Gold Medalist) with her husband Allan Kusuma, who is also an Olympic Badminton Gold Medalist. FE's spokesmen and spokeswoman are the cream of Indonesian sports.

A BIG THANK YOU to Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and his team, Joe Prabah, Anowar JM and Irene Mongkar for organizing the successful event! A BIG THANK YOU also to MC Sandro Tobing, well known TV personality and singer for a great job!

FE is going to commit a lot of resources into building FE's business in Indonesia and would like to encourage FE's Malaysian Leaders to focus their attention on Indonesia NOW. Indonesia presents enormous potential for FE for the following reasons:

- Huge middleclass market, more than Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines combined!

- Market at Malaysia's doorsteps and well serviced by low cost airlines.

- No language barrier for Malaysians, as in Thailand and Vietnam.

- Indonesians are well familiar with MLM concept, therefore no need to educate on MLM.

- Right Timing. Indonesia, like the rest of the world is affected by the global economic crisis.
  Many in the middleclass are NOW looking for new business opportunities.

- Reputable Indonesian Country Licensee with office and MLM license.

- Reputable and well known FE Indonesian Spokesmen and Spokeswoman.

- FE's formidable global track record over the past 3 years.

FE, with our highly endorsed Quantum Pendant (now sold in over 130 countries with 30 Country Licensees) and great track record of building very successful leaders in many countries such as Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Australia, Vietnam, etc will do VERY WELL in Indonesia! So, go for it, DON'T WAIT! FE looks forward to the next event in Jakarta and to build FE's business aggressively in Indonesia! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO! SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!
